verses.verse: The Spirit <S%H7307><s%> of the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%> is upon me; because the LORD <S%H3068><s%> hath anointed <S%H4886><s%> me to preach good tidings <S%H1319><s%> unto the meek <S%H6035><s%>; he hath sent <S%H7971><s%> me to bind up <S%H2280><s%> the brokenhearted <S%H7665><s%> <S%H3820><s%>, to proclaim <S%H7121><s%> liberty <S%H1865><s%> to the captives <S%H7617><s%>, and the opening of the prison <S%H6495><s%> to them that are bound <S%H631><s%>;

To proclaim <S%H7121><s%> the acceptable <S%H7522><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, and the day <S%H3117><s%> of vengeance <S%H5359><s%> of our God <S%H430><s%>; to comfort <S%H5162><s%> all that mourn <S%H57><s%>;

To appoint <S%H7760><s%> unto them that mourn <S%H57><s%> in Zion <S%H6726><s%>, to give <S%H5414><s%> unto them beauty <S%H6287><s%> for ashes <S%H665><s%>, the oil <S%H8081><s%> of joy <S%H8342><s%> for mourning <S%H60><s%>, the garment <S%H4594><s%> of praise <S%H8416><s%> for the spirit <S%H7307><s%> of heaviness <S%H3544><s%>; that they might be called <S%H7121><s%> trees <S%H352><s%> of righteousness <S%H6664><s%>, the planting <S%H4302><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, that he might be glorified <S%H6286><s%>.

¶ And they shall build <S%H1129><s%> the old <S%H5769><s%> wastes <S%H2723><s%>, they shall raise up <S%H6965><s%> the former <S%H7223><s%> desolations <S%H8074><s%>, and they shall repair <S%H2318><s%> the waste <S%H2721><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%>, the desolations <S%H8074><s%> of many <S%H1755><s%> generations <S%H1755><s%>.

And strangers <S%H2114><s%> shall stand <S%H5975><s%> and feed <S%H7462><s%> your flocks <S%H6629><s%>, and the sons <S%H1121><s%> of the alien <S%H5236><s%> shall be your plowmen <S%H406><s%> and your vinedressers <S%H3755><s%>.

But ye shall be named <S%H7121><s%> the Priests <S%H3548><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%>: men shall call <S%H559><s%> you the Ministers <S%H8334><s%> of our God <S%H430><s%>: ye shall eat <S%H398><s%> the riches <S%H2428><s%> of the Gentiles <S%H1471><s%>, and in their glory <S%H3519><s%> shall ye boast <S%H3235><s%> yourselves.

¶ For your shame <S%H1322><s%> ye shall have double <S%H4932><s%>; and for confusion <S%H3639><s%> they shall rejoice <S%H7442><s%> in their portion <S%H2506><s%>: therefore in their land <S%H776><s%> they shall possess <S%H3423><s%> the double <S%H4932><s%>: everlasting <S%H5769><s%> joy <S%H8057><s%> shall be unto them.

For I the LORD <S%H3068><s%> love <S%H157><s%> judgment <S%H4941><s%>, I hate <S%H8130><s%> robbery <S%H1498><s%> for burnt offering <S%H5930><s%>; and I will direct <S%H5414><s%> their work <S%H6468><s%> in truth <S%H571><s%>, and I will make <S%H3772><s%> an everlasting <S%H5769><s%> covenant <S%H1285><s%> with them.

And their seed <S%H2233><s%> shall be known <S%H3045><s%> among the Gentiles <S%H1471><s%>, and their offspring <S%H6631><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%>: all that see <S%H7200><s%> them shall acknowledge <S%H5234><s%> them, that they are the seed <S%H2233><s%> which the LORD <S%H3068><s%> hath blessed <S%H1288><s%>.

I will greatly <S%H7797><s%> rejoice <S%H7797><s%> in the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, my soul <S%H5315><s%> shall be joyful <S%H1523><s%> in my God <S%H430><s%>; for he hath clothed <S%H3847><s%> me with the garments <S%H899><s%> of salvation <S%H3468><s%>, he hath covered <S%H3271><s%> me with the robe <S%H4598><s%> of righteousness <S%H6666><s%>, as a bridegroom <S%H2860><s%> decketh <S%H3547><s%> himself with ornaments <S%H6287><s%>, and as a bride <S%H3618><s%> adorneth <S%H5710><s%> herself with her jewels <S%H3627><s%>.

For as the earth <S%H776><s%> bringeth forth <S%H3318><s%> her bud <S%H6780><s%>, and as the garden <S%H1593><s%> causeth the things that are sown <S%H2221><s%> in it to spring forth <S%H6779><s%>; so the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%> will cause righteousness <S%H6666><s%> and praise <S%H8416><s%> to spring forth <S%H6779><s%> before all the nations <S%H1471><s%>.
